name: Matrix Terminal Clock
description: Displays the current time in cyberpunk style in the terminal header.
author: Synth Dev

name: Rain Intensity Slider
description: Lets you adjust the matrix rain effect intensity and color.
author: Synth Dev

name: Code Statistics
description: Shows line counts, character counts, and file metrics for your project.
author: Neon Coder

name: Syntax Highlighter Pro
description: Enhanced syntax highlighting with 20+ language themes and custom color palettes.
author: Neon Coder

name: File Diff Viewer
description: Compare file versions side by side with highlighted changes and merge support.
author: Cypher Dev

name: Snippet Manager
description: Save, organize, and reuse code snippets across all your projects.
author: Synth Dev

name: Project Notes
description: Attach markdown notes and TODO lists to any project for quick reference.
author: Cypher Dev

name: Color Picker
description: Inline color picker for CSS values with hex, RGB, and HSL support.
author: Neon Coder

name: Terminal Themes
description: Custom terminal color schemes, fonts, and prompt styles for your console.
author: Synth Dev

name: Auto Formatter
description: Automatically format code on save with configurable Prettier rules.
author: Cypher Dev
